str2: From the base of posis with enclitic adverb of origin; from which or what place, state, source or cause.

str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A mother. Apparently a primary word; a 'mother'.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.

str2: To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.
